stages.title: Catch the fox!
stages.description: A fox has been stealing our most precious food, catch it by any means necessary and bury our food. Once is done, I will tell you the secret code.
stages.objective: Bury the food stolen by the fox.
clues: Fox was last time seen in the Perunantie 2
